text: High School Musical is a 2006 Disney television movie, starring Zac Efron, Vanessa Anne Hudgens, Ashley Tisdale, Corbin Bleu, Monique Coleman and Lucas Grabeel. Its sequel is High School Musical 2. This film is produced by Salty Pictures and First Street Films. The story is set in New Mexico. It is about two high school students, Troy Bolton, who is captain of his school's basketball team, and Gabriella Montez, a shy new student who is good in mathematics and science. Together, they try out for the lead parts in their high school musical. Despite other students' attempts to foil their dreams, Troy and Gabriella persist and inspire others along the way. They also make new friends. == Other websites == * Official website * * High School Musical news Category:2006 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s musical movies Category:2000s television movies Category:2000s teen comedy movies Category:2000s teen drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American television movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Kenny Ortega Category:Movies set in New Mexico
title: High School Musical
